languages.text: Нечестивое одобрение Темных богов легло на плечи Вольного Торговца, показав всем, что именно в {mf|нем|ней} они видят сво{mf|его|ю} чемпион{mf|а|ку}, котор{mf|ый|ая} приведет Простор под их власть. Впрочем, милость повелителей варпа переменчива, и всем это известно.

The unholy blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it is well known that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.
languages.original_text: Нечестивое одобрение Темных богов легло на плечи Вольного Торговца, показав всем, что именно в {mf|нем|ней} они видят сво{mf|его|ю} чемпион{mf|а|ку}, котор{mf|ый|ая} приведет Простор под их власть. Впрочем, милость повелителей варпа переменчива, и всем это известно.

traits.locale_text: The unholy approval of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader and showed everyone that they see in {mf|him|her} their champion, who will bring the Expanse under their rule. Though, the favour of the lords of warp is fickle, and everyone knows it.

The unholy approval of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader and showed everyone that they see in {mf|him|her} their champion, who will bring the Expanse under their rule. Though, the favour of the lords of warp is fickle, and everyone knows it.

The unrighteous blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it's no great mystery that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

The unrighteous blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it's no great mystery that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

The unholy blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it is well known that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

The unholy blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it is well known that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

languages.text: 黑暗诸神邪恶的祝福落在了行商浪人的肩上，让所有人明白{mf|他|她}就是祂们的勇士，注定要将科罗努斯扩区置于混沌的统治之下。然而，众所周知，亚空间主宰们的青睐总是变化无常。
languages.original_text: The unholy blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it is well known that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗诸神邪恶的祝福落在了行商浪人的肩上，让所有人明白{mf|他|她}就是祂们的勇士，注定要将科罗努斯扩区置于混沌的统治之下。然而，众所周知，亚空间主宰们的青睐总是变化无常。

languages.text: Der unheilige Segen der Dunklen Götter fiel auf die Schultern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und zeigte allen, dass {mf|er ihr Streiter|sie ihre Streiterin} war, dazu bestimmt, die Ausdehnung unter ihre Herrschaft zu bringen. Es ist jedoch allgemein bekannt, dass die Gunst des Herren des Warp wankelmütig ist.
languages.original_text: The unholy blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it is well known that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

traits.locale_text: Der unrechtschaffene Segen der Dunklen Götter fiel auf die Schultern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und zeigte allen, dass {mf|er ihr Streiter|sie ihre Streiterin} war, dazu bestimmt, die Ausdehnung unter ihre Herrschaft zu bringen. Es ist jedoch kein großes Mysterium, dass die Gunst des Herren des Warp wankelmütig ist.

languages.text: Les Dieux Sombres accordèrent leur bénédiction impie {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} et tout le monde sut alors qu'{mf|il|elle} était leur {mf|champion|championne}, {mf|destiné|destinée} à prendre le contrôle des Étendues en leur nom. Cependant, il est bien connu que les seigneurs du Warp sont capricieux.
languages.original_text: The unholy blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it is well known that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

traits.locale_text: Les Dieux Sombres accordèrent leur bénédiction impie {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} et tout le monde sut alors qu'{mf|il|elle} était leur {mf|champion|championne}, {mf|destiné|destinée} à prendre le contrôle des Étendues en leur nom. Cependant, il est bien connu que les seigneurs du Warp sont capricieux.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente obtuvo la bendición impía de los Dioses Oscuros, prueba de que era su campe{mf|ón|ona} y de que estaba destinad{mf|o|a} a poner la Extensión a su servicio. Sin embargo, es bien sabido que el favor de los amos de la disformidad es caprichoso.
languages.original_text: The unholy blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it is well known that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente obtuvo la bendición impía de los Dioses Oscuros, prueba de que era su campe{mf|ón|ona} y de que estaba destinad{mf|o|a} a poner la Extensión a su servicio. Sin embargo, es bien sabido que el favor de los amos de la disformidad es caprichoso.

languages.text: 暗黒神の邪悪な祝福が自由開拓者の肩に降り注ぎ、{mf|彼|彼女}こそがエクスパンスを支配下に置く運命にある彼らの王者であることを皆に示した。しかし、歪みの支配者の寵愛が気まぐれであることは、よく知られていることだ。
languages.original_text: The unholy blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it is well known that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

traits.locale_text: 暗黒神の邪悪な祝福が自由開拓者の肩に降り注ぎ、{mf|彼|彼女}こそがエクスパンスを支配下に置く運命にある彼らの王者であることを皆に示した。しかし、歪みの支配者の寵愛が気まぐれであることは、よく知られていることだ。

languages.text: Kara Tanrıların habis kutsamasına mazhar olan Hür Tacir; herkese kendisinin Tanrıların müdafisi olduğunu, kaderinde Enginlik'i onların hâkimiyetine sokmak yazdığını gösteriyordu. Oysa asıl gerçek, öteboyutun efendilerinin lütfunun hercai olduğuydu.
languages.original_text: The unholy blessing of the Dark Gods fell on the shoulders of the Rogue Trader, showing everyone that {mf|he|she} was their champion, destined to bring the Expanse under their rule. But it is well known that the favour of the lords of the warp is fickle.

traits.locale_text: Karanlık Tanrıların habis kutsaması Hür Tacir'in üzerindeydi ve herkese, onun Tanrıların şampiyonu olduğunu, kaderinde Enginlik'i onların hâkimiyeti altına sokmak olduğunu gösteriyordu. Ancak herkes bilir ki öteboyutun efendilerinin lütfu hercaidir.
